promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic spider grass-type pokemon with ancient wings. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or spider. Ony answer with the generated name

It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Spit Beam. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "grass" or "Arachnofolia". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.

generatedDescription: Renowned for weaving incredible forest hammocks with sunlight-infused silk, this titan web-spinner's Spit Beam helps nourish wild berries.
